message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. It's worth at least $1,000,000 to me, and I know it would be just as valuable to you.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,050,000. This is a great opportunity to acquire a product that aligns perfectly with your needs and goals.  Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss the details further.
